item.title: Visual Analytics Project Assignment
item.dc:creator: Dylan Wong
item.description: Individual assignment for the visual analytics project.

item.title: DataViz MakeOver 3
item.dc:creator: Dylan Wong
item.description: A critique and proposed makeover of the data visualisation of **South-east Asia Armed Conflict Analysis** published on [Tableau Public](https://public.tableau.com/profile/tskam#!/vizhome/South-eastAsiaArmedConflictAnalysis/South-eastAsiaArmedConflictAnalysis). The data (South-East Asia) used for the visualisation could be obtained from [The Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project (ACLED)](https://acleddata.com/).

item.title: DataViz Makeover 2
item.dc:creator: Dylan Wong
item.description: A critique and proposed makeover of the data visualisation created by a research team to understand the willingness of the public on COVID-19 vaccination. The data used by the research team was obtained from Imperial College London YouGov Covid 19 Behaviour Tracker Data Hub hosted at Github (https://github.com/YouGov-Data/covid-19-tracker).

item.title: DataViz Makeover 1
item.dc:creator: Dylan Wong
item.description: This assignment sets to critically assess the data visualisation of Resident Labour by Age published by the Ministry of Manpower in the Labour Force in Singapore Advance Release 2019 report.

item.title: Welcome to Dylan's DataViz Blog
item.dc:creator: Dylan Wong
item.description: Welcome to my new blog. I hope you enjoy reading what I have to say!

item.title: My First Post
